title: I DON'T UNDERSTAND?!?
body:
Golden revel token = 96 Revel tokens
Golden revel token can get: Golden chroma or 1 Revel orb
1 Revel orb = 44 Revel tokens
WHY?
44 != 96
WHY GOLDEN REVEL TOKEN ONLY GIVE ONE REVEL ORB????
I dont want any of the golden chromas because i dont play any of the champs or have the corresponding skins, so i want to know if there is any piont in me saving up for that golden revel token or if i should just buy 2 revel orbs instead.

replies.body: The point is you get the gold ones for the chromas, but you have a fallback if you dont want the chromas. Should still get two, though..
You can get Golden Tokens in bundles too.  It's for people that get one in the bundle but don't want a Chroma.
